Enum ChannelSelector.Orientation

  • java.lang.Object

    ChannelSelector

    public static enum ChannelSelector.Orientation
extends java.lang.Enum<ChannelSelector.Orientation>
    Encapsulate the orientation of the display (not really used yet)
    Author:
    Elliott McCrory, Fermilab AD/Instrumentation

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      LANDSCAPE
      The screen is in a landscape orientation (wider)
      PORTRAIT
      the screen is in a portrait orientation (taller)
      SQUARE
      The screen is perfectly square
      UNDEFINED
      The screen orientation is not known
